The MMI and the S&P 500 are the two major indexes used by program traders to run their computerized trading strategies .	DT NNP CC DT NNP CD VBP DT CD JJ NNS VBN IN NN NNS TO VB PRP$ VBN NN NNS .
The programs are considered by many to be a major cause of the 1987 crash .	DT NNS VBP VBN IN JJ TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT CD NN .
The process of post-crash reforms began with calls to remake the markets and wound up a year later with a series of rather technical adjustments .	DT NN IN JJ NNS VBD IN NNS TO VB DT NNS CC VBD RP DT NN RB IN DT NN IN RB JJ NNS .
In October 1987 , just after the market drop , Washington was awash in talk of sweeping changes in the way the financial markets are structured and regulated .	IN NNP CD , RB IN DT NN NN , NNP VBD JJ IN NN IN VBG NNS IN DT NN DT JJ NNS VBP VBN CC VBN .
Over the next year that grand agenda was whittled down to a series of steps to soften big stock drops by interrupting trading to give market players time to pause and reconsider positions .	IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NN VBD VBN RB TO DT NN IN NNS TO VB JJ NN NNS IN VBG NN TO VB NN NNS NN TO VB CC VB NNS .
In addition , limits were placed on computer-driven trading , and steps were taken to better link the stock and futures markets .	IN NN , NNS VBD VBN IN JJ NN , CC NNS VBD VBN TO RB VB DT NN CC NNS NNS .
Few changes were made in the way the markets are regulated .	JJ NNS VBD VBN IN DT NN DT NNS VBP VBN .
At the outset the prime target was program trading , which was much discussed but little understood on Capitol Hill .	IN DT NN DT JJ NN VBD NN NN , WDT VBD RB VBN CC RB VBN IN NNP NNP .
There were also calls to strip the stock markets of `` derivative '' products , such as stock-index futures and options , which Federal Judge Stanley Sporkin , for example , likened to `` barnacles attached to the basic market . ''	EX VBD RB VBZ TO VB DT NN NNS IN `` JJ '' NNS , JJ IN JJ NNS CC NNS , WDT NNP NNP NNP NNP , IN NN , VBD TO `` NNS VBN TO DT JJ NN . ''
And there was much criticism of the New York Stock Exchange 's system of having stock trades flow through specialists , or market makers .	CC EX VBD JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP POS NN IN VBG NN NNS VB IN NNS , CC NN NNS .
When the Brady Task Force 's powerful analysis of the crash was released in January 1988 , it immediately reshaped the reformers ' agenda .	WRB DT NNP NNP NNP POS JJ NN IN DT NN VBD VBN IN NNP CD , PRP RB VBD DT NNS POS NN .
Arguing that the separate financial marketplaces acted as one , and concluding that the crash had `` raised the possibility of a full-scale financial system breakdown , '' the presidential task force called for establishing a super-regulator to oversee the markets , to make margins consistent across markets , to unify clearing systems and to install circuit breakers . Friday 's Market Activity	NNP POS NNP NNP
Prices of Treasury bonds surged in the biggest rally of the year as investors fled a plummeting stock market .	NNS IN NNP NNS VBD IN DT JJS NN IN DT NN IN NNS VBD DT VBG NN NN .
The benchmark 30-year Treasury bond was quoted 6 p.m. EDT at 103 12/32 , compared with 100 27/32 Thursday , up 2 1/2 points .	DT NN JJ NN NN VBD VBN CD NN NNP IN CD CD , VBN IN CD CD NNP , IN CD CD NNS .

Greece 's second bout of general elections this year is slated for Nov. 5 .	NNP POS JJ NN IN JJ NNS DT NN VBZ VBN IN NNP CD .
For those hoping to see a modicum of political normalcy restored -- in view of Greece 's eight-year misadventure under autocratic pseudosocialism and subsequent three-month hitch with a conservative-communist coalition government -- there is but one bright sign : The scandals still encircling former Prime Minister Andreas Papandreou and his fallen socialist government are like flies buzzing around a rotting carcass . A federal appeals court in San Francisco ruled that shareholders ca n't hold corporate officials liable for false sales projections on new products if the news media concurrently revealed substantial information about the product 's flaws .	DT JJ NNS NN IN NNP NNP VBD IN NNS MD RB VB JJ NNS JJ IN JJ NNS NNS IN JJ NNS IN DT NN NNS RB VBD JJ NN IN DT NN POS NNS .
The ruling stems from a 1984 suit filed by shareholders of Apple Computer Inc. , claiming that company officials misled investors about the expected success of the Lisa computer , introduced in 1983 .	DT NN VBZ IN DT CD NN VBN IN NNS IN NNP NNP NNP , VBG IN NN NNS VBD NNS IN DT VBN NN IN DT NNP NN , VBN IN CD .
Lawyers specializing in shareholder suits said they are concerned that use of the `` press defense '' by corporations may become popular as a result of the ruling .	NNS VBG IN NN NNS VBD PRP VBP VBN IN NN IN DT `` NN NN '' IN NNS MD VB JJ IN DT NN IN DT NN .
According to the suit , Apple officials created public excitement by touting Lisa as an office computer that would revolutionize the workplace and be extremely successful in its first year .	VBG TO DT NN , NNP NNS VBD JJ NN IN VBG NNP IN DT NN NN WDT MD VB DT NN CC VB RB JJ IN PRP$ JJ NN .
The plaintiffs also alleged that prior to the fanfare , the company circulated internal memos indicating problems with Lisa .	DT NNS RB VBN IN JJ TO DT NN , DT NN VBD JJ NNS VBG NNS IN NNP .
The suit claimed Apple 's stock climbed to a high of $ 63.50 a share on the basis of the company 's optimistic forecasts .	DT NN VBD NNP POS NN VBD TO DT JJ IN $ CD DT NN IN DT NN IN DT NN POS JJ NNS .
But when the company revealed Lisa 's poor sales late in 1983 , the stock plummeted to a low of $ 17.37 a share , according to the suit .	CC WRB DT NN VBD NNP POS JJ NNS RB IN CD , DT NN VBD TO DT JJ IN $ CD DT NN , VBG TO DT NN .
The shareholders claimed more than $ 150 million in losses .	DT NNS VBD JJR IN $ CD CD IN NNS .
In 1987 , the San Francisco district court dismissed the case largely because newspaper reports had sufficiently counterbalanced the company 's statements by alerting consumers to Lisa 's problems .	IN CD , DT NNP NNP NN NN VBD DT NN RB IN NN NNS VBD RB VBN DT NN POS NNS IN VBG NNS TO NNP POS NNS .
Late last month , the appeals court agreed that most of the case should be dismissed .	JJ JJ NN , DT NNS NN VBD IN JJS IN DT NN MD VB VBN .
However , it gave the shareholders the right to pursue a small portion of their claim that pertains to Lisa 's disk drive , known as Twiggy .	RB , PRP VBD DT NNS DT NN TO VB DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NN WDT VBZ TO NNP POS NN NN , VBN IN NNP .
The court ruled that the news media did n't reveal Twiggy 's problems at the time .	DT NN VBD IN DT NN NNS VBD RB VB NNP POS NNS IN DT NN .
Lawyers are worried about the ruling 's implication in other shareholder suits but pointed out that the court stressed that the ruling should be regarded as very specific to the Apple case .	NNS VBP VBN IN DT NN POS NN IN JJ NN NNS CC VBD RP IN DT NN VBD IN DT NN MD VB VBN IN RB JJ TO DT NNP NN .
`` The court was careful to say that the adverse information appeared in the very same articles and received the same attention as the company 's statements , '' said Patrick Grannon , a Los Angeles lawyer at the firm of Greenfield & Chimicles , which was n't involved in the case .	`` DT NN VBD JJ TO VB IN DT JJ NN VBD IN DT RB JJ NNS CC VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NN POS NNS , '' VBD NNP NNP , DT NNP NNP NN IN DT NN IN NNP CC NNP , WDT VBD RB VBN IN DT NN .
`` The court is saying that the adverse facts have to be transferred to the market with equal intensity and credibility as the statements of corporate insiders . ''	`` DT NN VBZ VBG IN DT JJ NNS VBP TO VB VBN TO DT NN IN JJ NN CC NN IN DT NNS IN JJ NNS . ''
Shareholders ' attorneys at the New York firm of Milberg , Weiss , Bershad , Specthrie & Lerach last week petitioned for a rehearing of the case .	NNS POS NNS IN DT NNP NNP NN IN NNP , NNP , NNP , NNP CC NNP JJ NN VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN .
They wrote : `` The opinion establishes a new rule of immunity -- that if a wide variety of opinions on a company 's business are publicly reported , the company can say anything without fear of securities liability . The National Football League is considering appealing the ruling stemming from the U.S. Football League 's largely unsuccessful antitrust suit against the NFL .	DT NNP NNP NNP VBZ VBG VBG DT NN VBG IN DT NNP NNP NNP POS RB JJ JJ NN IN DT NNP .
A jury in 1986 agreed with the USFL 's claims that the NFL monopolized major league football .	DT NN IN CD VBD IN DT NNP POS NNS IN DT NNP VBD JJ NN NN .
But the jury awarded the USFL only $ 1 in damages , trebled because of the antitrust claims .	CC DT NN VBD DT NNP RB $ CD IN NNS , VBD IN IN DT JJ NNS .
Last week , the U.S. Court of Appeals in New York upheld a $ 5.5 million award of attorneys fees to the defunct league .	JJ NN , DT NNP NNP IN NNPS IN NNP NNP VBD DT $ CD CD NN IN NNS NNS TO DT JJ NN .
Harvey D. Myerson , of Myerson & Kuhn , then of Finley , Kumble , Wagner , Heine , Underberg , Manley , Myerson & Casey , was the lead trial lawyer , and his new firm pursued the application appeal . Myerson & Kuhn will get about $ 260,000 for the costs of pressing the application .	NNP CC NNP MD VB IN $ CD IN DT NNS IN VBG DT NN .
The federal appeals court held that the nominal damages and the failure to prove all claims did n't exclude the USFL from being reimbursed .	DT JJ NNS NN VBD IN DT JJ NNS CC DT NN TO VB DT NNS VBD RB VB DT NNP IN VBG VBN .
Antitrust laws provide that injured parties may be reimbursed for lawyers ' fees .	JJ NNS VBP IN VBN NNS MD VB VBN IN NNS POS NNS .
But Shepard Goldfein , an attorney for the NFL , says his client will consider asking for another hearing or appealing to the U.S. Supreme Court .	CC NNP NNP , DT NN IN DT NNP , VBZ PRP$ NN MD VB VBG IN DT NN CC VBG TO DT NNP NNP NNP .

Pauline Yoshihashi in Los Angeles contributed to this column .	NNP NNP IN NNP NNP VBD TO DT NN .
Of all the one-time expenses incurred by a corporation or professional firm , few are larger or longer term than the purchase of real estate or the signing of a commercial lease .	IN PDT DT JJ NNS VBN IN DT NN CC JJ JJ , JJ VBP JJR CC JJR NN IN DT NN IN JJ NN CC DT NN IN DT JJ NN .
To take full advantage of the financial opportunities in this commitment , however , the corporation or professional firm must do more than negotiate the best purchase price or lease terms .	TO VB JJ NN IN DT JJ NNS IN DT NN , RB , DT NN CC JJ NN MD VB RBR IN VB DT JJS NN NN CC NN NNS .
It must also evaluate the real-estate market in the chosen location from a new perspective .	PRP MD RB VB DT NN NN IN DT VBN NN IN DT JJ NN .
Specifically , it must understand how real-estate markets overreact to shifts in regional economies and then take advantage of these opportunities .	RB , PRP MD VB WRB NN NNS VBP TO NNS IN JJ NNS CC RB VBP NN IN DT NNS .
When a regional economy catches cold , the local real-estate market gets pneumonia .	WRB DT JJ NN VBZ NN , DT JJ NN NN VBZ NN .
In other words , real-estate market indicators , such as building permits and leasing activity , plummet much further than a local economy in recession .	IN JJ NNS , NN NN NNS , JJ IN NN NNS CC NN NN , VBP RB RB IN DT JJ NN IN NN .
This was seen in the late 1960s in Los Angeles and the mid-1970s in New York .	DT VBD VBN IN DT JJ CD IN NNP NNP CC DT CD IN NNP NNP .
But the reverse is also true : When a region 's economy rebounds from a slowdown , these real-estate indicators will rebound far faster than the improving economy .	CC DT NN VBZ RB JJ : WRB DT NN POS NN VBZ IN DT NN , DT NN NNS MD VB RB RBR IN DT VBG NN .
Why do local real-estate markets overreact to regional economic cycles ?	WRB VBP JJ NN NNS VB TO JJ JJ NNS .
Because real-estate purchases and leases are such major long-term commitments that most companies and individuals make these decisions only when confident of future economic stability and growth .	IN NN NNS CC NNS VBP JJ JJ JJ NNS IN JJS NNS CC NNS VBP DT NNS RB WRB JJ IN JJ JJ NN CC NN .
Metropolitan Detroit was written off economically during the early 1980s , as the domestic auto industry suffered a serious sales depression and adjustment .	NNP NNP VBD VBN RP RB IN DT JJ CD , IN DT JJ NN NN VBD DT JJ NNS NN CC NN .
Area employment dropped by 13 % from its 1979 peak and retail sales were down 14 % .	NN NN VBD IN CD NN IN PRP$ CD NN CC JJ NNS VBD IN CD NN .
However , the real-estate market was hurt even more .	RB , DT NN NN VBD VBN RB JJR .
For example , residential building permits in the trough year of 1982 were off 76 % from the 1979 peak level .	IN NN , JJ NN NNS IN DT NN NN IN CD VBD IN CD NN IN DT CD NN NN .
Once metropolitan Detroit 's economy rallied in the mid-1980s , real estate rebounded .	RB JJ NNP POS NN VBD IN DT CD , JJ NN VBD .
Building permits , for example , soared a staggering 400 % between 1982 and the peak year of 1986 .	NN NNS , IN NN , VBD DT JJ CD NN IN CD CC DT NN NN IN CD .
Where , savvy corporations and professional firms are now asking , are today 's opportunities ?	WRB , JJ NNS CC JJ NNS VBP RB VBG , VBP NN POS NNS .
Look no further than metropolitan Houston and Denver , two of the most depressed , overbuilt and potentially undervalued real-estate markets in the nation .	VB RB RB IN JJ NNP CC NNP , CD IN DT RBS VBN , NN CC RB VBD NN NNS IN DT NN .
Of course , some observers have touted Houston and Denver for the past five years as a counter-cyclical play .	IN NN , DT NNS VBP VBN NNP CC NNP IN DT JJ CD NNS IN DT JJ NN .
But now appears to be the time to act .	CC RB VBZ TO VB DT NN TO VB .
Metropolitan Houston 's economy did drop and then flatten in the years after its 1982 peak .	NNP NNP POS NN VBD VB CC RB VB IN DT NNS IN PRP$ CD NN .
In the mid-1980s , employment was down as much as 5 % from the 1982 peak and retail sales were off 13 % .	IN DT CD , NN VBD IN RB JJ IN CD NN IN DT CD NN CC JJ NNS VBD IN CD NN .
The real-estate market suffered even more severe setbacks .	DT NN NN VBD RB RBR JJ NNS .
Office construction dropped 97 % .	NN NN VBD CD NN .
The vacancy rate soared more than 20 % in nearly every product category , and more than 30 % of office space was vacant .	DT NN NN VBD JJR IN CD NN IN RB DT NN NN , CC JJR IN CD NN IN NN NN VBD JJ .
To some observers , the empty office buildings of Houston 's `` see-through skyline '' were indicative of a very troubled economy .	TO DT NNS , DT JJ NN NNS IN NNP POS `` JJ NN '' VBD JJ IN DT RB JJ NN .
As usual , the real-estate market had overreacted .	IN JJ , DT NN NN VBD VBN .
Actually , the region 's economy retained a firm foundation .	RB , DT NN POS NN VBD DT JJ NN .
Metropolitan Houston 's population has held steady over the past six years .	NNP NNP POS NN VBZ VBN JJ IN DT JJ CD NNS .

For 20 years , federal rules have barred the three major television networks from sharing in one of the most lucrative and fastest-growing parts of the television business .	IN CD NNS , JJ NNS VBP VBN DT CD JJ NN NNS IN VBG IN CD IN DT RBS JJ CC JJ NNS IN DT NN NN .

President F.W. de Klerk released the ANC men -- along with one of the founding members of the Pan Africanist Congress , a rival liberation group -- as part of his efforts to create a climate of trust and peace in which his government can begin negotiations with black leaders over a new constitution aimed at giving blacks a voice in national government .
